title: Extraordinary self-powered Y-shaped flexible film thermoelectric device for wearables
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01742K, Communication
Xinjie Yuan, Pengfei Qiu, Chuanyao Sun, Shiqi Yang, Yi Wu, Lidong Chen, Xun Shi
Herein, by using the ductile thermoelectric material Ag2Se0.67S0.33, we have successfully developed Y-shaped flexible film thermoelectric devices with excellent flexibility and record-high output power density when worn on the human body.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
